oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ernest Tubb performs So Many Times -- Melvin Friestadt interviews Ernest Tubb
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Ernest Tubb performs So Many Times, followed by a short message for Jim Evans from Melvin Friestadt, and an incomplete interview of Ernest Tubb by Melvin Friestadt, conducted backstage at the Opry (see [ TR001835_1 ] for a complete version).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ernest Tubb
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: So Many Times (Ernest Tubb) -- Melvin Friestadt talks -- Melvin Friestadt interviews Ernest Tubb (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984;
